N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 110.1 - Requirements for approval of a summer elementary school

State Regulations

To be approved, a summer elementary school shall: (a) except in the case of a program approved
pursuant to section
110.5
of this Part, comprise the
summer session of a public elementary school and use the building(s) and
equipment of such school or other suitable facility as approved by the

Commissioner of Education; (b) provide a program during the months of July and August of at least 20 hours of
instruction; (c) employ teachers
who are certified to teach in the elementary schools of this State, and use
paraprofessionals as needed; and
(d) provide daily instructional sessions of
at least one hour but not more than five hours. Notes
